author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

Triggered by the discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49627. As is `das-up-to-nevents.py` , checks if we are running within Jenkins. This was done at the time since, to simplify `das-up-to-nevents` when running PR tests, just to avoid crashes. In https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49020 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49045 the crashes were understood to be coming from accessing the certification web page too many times. Now the bot access the JSONs from `cvmfs`. 

This PR proposes to just remove the `testing` limitation for the bot, allowing PR tests to use certified lumisections.
title: Removing `JENKINS` Check from `das-up-to-nevents.py`
